project_name.justification: Fuse Battery Metals Inc. ("the Company "or "Fuse") (TSXV:FUSE)(OTCQB:FUSEF)(FRA:43W3) is pleased to announce the expansion of our exploration land holdings with the inclusion of a new lithium exploration project in Nevada, the Lithium Springs Project.

company_name.justification: Fuse Battery Metals Inc. ("the Company "or "Fuse") (TSXV:FUSE)(OTCQB:FUSEF)(FRA:43W3) is pleased to announce the expansion of our exploration land holdings with the inclusion of a new lithium exploration project in Nevada, the Lithium Springs Project.

ceo_buyer.justification: On Behalf of the Board of Directors "Tim Fernback" Tim Fernback, Interim President & CEO

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The Company has entered into a Purchase and Sale Agreement dated February 14, 2023, to acquire a 100% interest in 108 placer claims (BRD1 - BRD108) from Malcolm J. Bell (the "Vendor").

primary_commodity.justification: ...is pleased to announce the expansion of our exploration land holdings with the inclusion of a new lithium exploration project in Nevada, the Lithium Springs Project.

verified_article_link.justification: The article content is about the acquisition of the Lithium Springs Project by Fuse Battery Metals Inc., which matches the primary project of interest.

currency.justification: The Company agrees to the following: (a) reimburse the staking and recording costs to the Vendor in the amount of US$33,982 upon signing the Agreement;

cash_payments_raw.justification: The Company agrees to the following: (a) reimburse the staking and recording costs to the Vendor in the amount of US$33,982 upon signing the Agreement;

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction terms specify the number of shares to be issued, not their monetary value.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The cash and share components of the payment are listed separately and no combined value is provided.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: (b) issuing to the Vendor 500,000 fully paid and non-assessable common shares in the capital of the Company upon TSX Venture Exchange acceptance of the Transaction.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants are mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options are mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

issued_share_price.justification: The transaction terms mention the number of shares issued, but not the price. Using the last traded price as a fallback, as seen in the detailed quote: 'Last: 0.05'.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No exploration commitment in meters is mentioned in the text.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text describes a "Proposed Exploration Plan" but does not state a binding monetary commitment for exploration. It only states "A reasonable expectation for a First Phase exploration program..."

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The transaction terms do not mention any Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) or Gross Revenue Royalty (GRR).

coverage_area_raw.justification: The claims cover approximately 858 hectares of playa and alluvial fan located at the south end of the Black Rock Desert...

coverage_area_unit.justification: The claims cover approximately 858 hectares of playa and alluvial fan located at the south end of the Black Rock Desert...

resource_size.justification: The text does not contain a quantified mineral resource estimate with mass or volume units (e.g., tonnes, ounces). It only mentions surface sample grades (e.g., "Values ranged from 82.8 to 520 ppm lithium") and exploration potential.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: Fuse Battery Metals Inc. ("the Company "or "Fuse") (TSXV:FUSE)(OTCQB:FUSEF)(FRA:43W3) is pleased to announce the expansion of our exploration land holdings...
